column17:
This pouch from Travel Blue is a perfect accessory for carrying and protecting your MP3 player mobile phone keys and money while travelling or during any sports activity. This pouch can be carried on the belt or arm. The pouch also has belt loop. .Features

  • Colour: Black
  • Material:Neoprene
  • Usage: Travel
